title: Perm banned, PLEASE HELP!
body:
I got perm banned because players reported me for offensive language.
You can see through the evidence that I never used offensive language... I think they just reported me because they are trolling and I got perm banned.
Please give me another chance, I worked hard for my account.
Thank you

replies.body: This thread needs more chatlogs. Or any, really.
LOL. Chat logs buddy. Give em.
please post the chat logs on your card when you try to log in.
you have to submit a ticket to riot support, noone here can help. If you want to you can paste the chatlogs for community to see but nothing more

> [{quoted}](name=Stay Close Dear,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A9jwLgob,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-09-16T11:17:41.619+0000)
>
> you have to submit a ticket to riot support, noone here can help. If you want to you can paste the chatlogs for community to see but nothing more

What's a ticket?

> [{quoted}](name=I H8 KARTH ULTI,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A9jwLgob,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-16T08:57:43.120+0000)
>
> I think they just reported me because they are trolling and I got perm banned.

Yea, doesn't work that way buddy.
Yeaaaaa, you're lying out your behind.
